trends: There has been one other sighting in Odenton
There were no other sightings in Odenton on or around March 29th 2009
Summary: Baseball-sized fireball with a bright green flare.
divs: sighting details1. i was on waugh chapel rd., driving home. 2. a bright light in the sky made me notice the object. 3. when i first saw the object i thought it was a missle of some sort, but it was far too small to be a missle. 4. the object was a fireball about the size of a baseball\volleyball and it was very bright with a green flare trailing behind. it was falling straight down to earth at a very high speed. 5. at first i was very concerned that maybe it was a weapon of some sort and was intially expecting detonation of some sort. i drove toward the area i thought the object impacted. i was unable to find it or any signs of where it landed. also, i was unable to take any pictuers or video of this because i didn't have a camera on hand and even if i did there would not have been enough time since it was moving so fast. 6. i lost sight by the object falling to fast for me to keep up with.
